title-of-article: EUIPO - IP Horizon 5.0 Conference / Event Report / News / / Sony
content: On 26-27 September, the EUIPO along with McCarthy Institute held the IP Horizon 5.0 Conference in Alicante, Spain marking their 25th anniversary. At this global conference that brought together representatives from some of the leading IP offices in the world, international businesses, policy-makers, Yutaka Hasegawa, the head of Sony Design took a part and presented challenges of IP from a design perspective.
